contents.text: Throws a debuff Cloud that increases received damage by 40% for all enemies inside. Use while crouching to throw a Health Cloud that heals teammates instead. Up to 3 clouds can be stored and used at will.
Buffs damage for a teammate by 50% for 5 seconds (look at them and press Q).
Spawns 8 spiders, that attack enemies in a 30 block radius. The Spiders select targets evenly. They die in one hit or after 9 seconds.
